column4: Fresh ubuntu installed: what's the newest and best drivers for my ATI Radeon 9800 XT?
on edgy I'd still have to suggest (regretfully) fglrx, but on feisty I'd say use the open source driver included in ubuntu
Fresh installation of feisty, Radeon 9800 XT, what's the best root for using beryl with sweet graphics?
free drivers+aiglx will work, but fglrx+Xgl will have much better performance
can you please direct me to the right place for me to setup fglrx because I've restarted from scratch close to a dozen times now
are you sure that 9800 XT can use fglrx and xgl? and where is the proper guide that I should use for installing fglrx?
I don't know how to do that command
two urls so far, which should I use?
OMG!!!!! you are sooooo amazing!  ----- do you know how long I've been trying different tutorials on how to install fglrx correctly?? It works now
